rows.label: tlk4450018501_msg0001
rows.name:
I have made my decision. I shall spread
the true history of Luxuria and His
Highness's intentions to the people.

rows.label: tlk4450018501_msg0002
rows.name:
And let us steer those stray sheep who
disapprove back on the right path.

rows.label: tlk4450018501_msg0003
rows.name:
It has been some time since I have
preached anything, but I will try my
hardest to convey the new teachings.

rows.label: tlk4450018501_msg0004
rows.name:
Of course, were it not for Zeke, we
could never have achieved all this.
Thank you, my child.
